name: Shared Demise
description:
A game where you share damage with your enemies.

Shoot the chain at the enemies to get linked, once linked you share all damage taken. The way you progress is by being the only one alive. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Left mouse button to shoot the chain.
  • Space to unlink all chains
  • R to restart
  • Walk close to corpses to eat them and heal up
  • You start with one chain and get more as the game progresses
  • Destroy everyone

If having trouble figuring out what to do: you first chain yourself with an enemy, and then you can walk into mines to damage yourself and the one you are chained with, and then eat enemies to heal up. You can do that with bullets also. Have fun!
